name: pdfmake-browserified
description: Browserified version of pdfmake. Supports require() and script-tag. Default font Roboto included, thus zero configuration. Supports custom fonts.

scripts.build: browserify src/pdfmake.js -g aliasify -s createPdf -p browserify-derequire -d -p [minifyify --no-map] -o build/pdfmake-browserified.min.js
scripts.prestart: npm run build && npm run build_test

author: xErik
